description:
The Swing Shift Boxer Brief and Sock Pack will be a great gift for the man in your life (Or just a good deal for you!)

The Swing Shift caresses the skin with the finest beechwood fibre in 2Undr's signature Modal fabric. Pure heavenly softness. Perfection in your pants. Plus a pair of 2Undr's socks designed to compel one’s attention without losing one’s respect. However, everyone knows that your socks should match your underwear. Fashion 101.
name: 2Undr Swing Shift Boxer Briefs + Socks Pack - Mens
